job.title: GCP Data Engineer
job.description: Hi Professionals.., I am looking to hire # GCP Data Engineer #position. Please find the below Job Description and share me the feedback if you are interested. Client:Macys Implementation:Infosys Job Title:GCP Data Engineer Work Location: Atlanta, GA Duraton:06 Months Must Have Skills All Are Required GCP Python Detailed Job Description Candidate must be located within commuting distance of Atlanta, GA or be willing to relocate to the area. 7 years of experience with Information Technology and Data engineering. 3 years of experience in Big Data on Big Data, Python, Scala, Spark Big Data, Scala and spark Thanks & Regards Chinni Veladri SoftHQ Inc - Technical Recruiter Direct: 618-360-5859 E-mail: veladri@softhq.com
